changeSet.author: max
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO body (name) VALUES ('sedan'), ('hatchback'), ('station wagon'), ('off-road car'), ('cabriolet'), ('coupe'), ('limousine'), ('minivan'), ('pickup truck'), ('van'), ('minibus');

changeSet.author: max
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO users (login, password, role_id) VALUES ( 'root', '$2a$10$ACEqlf4F9jgeuDMqsK.ifO37depwvIBCWijrMYJvioJ8Fs0JD0oWK', (SELECT id FROM roles WHERE name = 'ROLE_ADMIN') ), ( 'user', '$2a$12$HIvfiOSpz18Vq/J11yK2cugslccS.5FYftAC1.S.OCxXxV.ZNvg.a', (SELECT id FROM roles WHERE name = 'ROLE_USER')), ( 'user1', '$2a$12$HIvfiOSpz18Vq/J11yK2cugslccS.5FYftAC1.S.OCxXxV.ZNvg.a', (SELECT id FROM roles WHERE name = 'ROLE_USER') );

changeSet.author: max
changeSet.sql:
INSERT INTO model (name, brand_id) VALUES ('X1', (SELECT id FROM brand WHERE name = 'BMW')), ('X2', (SELECT id FROM brand WHERE name = 'BMW')), ('X3', (SELECT id FROM brand WHERE name = 'BMW')), ('X4', (SELECT id FROM brand WHERE name = 'BMW')), ('X5', (SELECT id FROM brand WHERE name = 'BMW')), ('X6', (SELECT id FROM brand WHERE name = 'BMW')), ('Sonata', (SELECT id FROM brand WHERE name = 'Hyundai')), ('Solaris', (SELECT id FROM brand WHERE name = 'Hyundai')), ('Tucson', (SELECT id FROM brand WHERE name = 'Hyundai')), ('Creta', (SELECT id FROM brand WHERE name = 'Hyundai')), ('Vesta', (SELECT id FROM brand WHERE name = 'ВАЗ (Lada)')), ('Granta', (SELECT id FROM brand WHERE name = 'ВАЗ (Lada)')), ('Kalina', (SELECT id FROM brand WHERE name = 'ВАЗ (Lada)')), ('Priora', (SELECT id FROM brand WHERE name = 'ВАЗ (Lada)')),
('Just a Honda model', (SELECT id FROM brand WHERE name = 'Honda')), ('Just a Mazda model', (SELECT id FROM brand WHERE name = 'Mazda')), ('Just a Porsche model', (SELECT id FROM brand WHERE name = 'Porsche')), ('Just a ГАЗ model', (SELECT id FROM brand WHERE name = 'ГАЗ')), ('Just a УАЗ model', (SELECT id FROM brand WHERE name = 'УАЗ'));

changeSet.author: max
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO car ( model_id, year, mileage, body_id, color_id, volume, transmission_id, engine_id, drive_id, right_wheel, broken, owners_num, vin, power, address, user_id, price, date_created, sold ) VALUES ( (SELECT id FROM model WHERE name = 'X6'), 2016, 10000, (SELECT id FROM body WHERE name = 'hatchback'), (SELECT id FROM color WHERE name = 'silver'), 3.2, (SELECT id FROM transmission WHERE name = 'automatic'), (SELECT id FROM engine WHERE name = 'diesel'), (SELECT id FROM drive WHERE name = 'four-wheel'), false, false, 1, 'XX215869674357474', 247, 'Chelyabinsk, Center', (SELECT id FROM users WHERE login = 'user1'), 3350000, to_timestamp('01-08-2017 12:12:12', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), true );

changeSet.author: max
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO car ( model_id, year, mileage, body_id, color_id, volume, transmission_id, engine_id, drive_id, right_wheel, broken, owners_num, vin, power, address, user_id, price, date_created, sold ) VALUES ( (SELECT id FROM model WHERE name = 'X3'), 2009, 132000, (SELECT id FROM body WHERE name = 'off-road car'), (SELECT id FROM color WHERE name = 'blue'), 2.5, (SELECT id FROM transmission WHERE name = 'automatic'), (SELECT id FROM engine WHERE name = 'petrol'), (SELECT id FROM drive WHERE name = 'four-wheel'), false, false, 1, 'XX11111111111111111', 218, 'Москва, 7км Варшавского шоссе', (SELECT id FROM users WHERE login = 'user'), 635000, to_timestamp('02-08-2017 12:12:12', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), false );

changeSet.author: max
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO car ( model_id, year, mileage, body_id, color_id, volume, transmission_id, engine_id, drive_id, right_wheel, broken, owners_num, vin, power, address, user_id, price, date_created, sold ) VALUES ( (SELECT id FROM model WHERE name = 'Solaris'), 2016, 28000, (SELECT id FROM body WHERE name = 'sedan'), (SELECT id FROM color WHERE name = 'black'), 1.6, (SELECT id FROM transmission WHERE name = 'automatic'), (SELECT id FROM engine WHERE name = 'petrol'), (SELECT id FROM drive WHERE name = 'front-wheel'), false, true, 3, 'XX3746765485435486468', 123, 'Москва, Кремль', (SELECT id FROM users WHERE login = 'user'), 99000, to_timestamp('01-08-2017 12:12:12', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), false );
